text: Charles Brooker (March 25, 1932 â€“ December 18, 2020) was a Canadian ice hockey player. He competed in the 1956 Winter Olympics. Brooker was a member of the Kitchener-Waterloo Dutchmen. He won the bronze medal for Canada in 1956 Winter Olympics. Brooker died on 18 December 2020 at the age of 88.Charlie Brooker ==References== ==Other websites== * * Charlie Brooker's profile at Sports Reference.com Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Canada
